transfer:
(:action transfer_to_storage
  :parameters (?p - player ?m - mortar_pestle ?c - container)
  :precondition (and (at ?p kitchen) (mixed ?m) (at ?c kitchen) (empty ?c))
  :effect (and (full ?c) (empty ?m))
)
pour:
(:action pour_into_container
  :parameters (?p - player ?c - container ?airtight_c - container)
  :precondition (and (at ?p kitchen) (full ?c) (empty ?airtight_c))
  :effect (and (full ?airtight_c) (empty ?c) (airtight ?airtight_c))
)
```

These actions represent the steps to make seasoned salt, considering the descriptions and entity states provided.
